General.Name: Excelsior Medical Co Ltd
General.Description: Excelsior Medical Co., Ltd. distributes medical related systems in Taiwan, China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, and the Philippines. The company offers equipment for hemodialysis, regular drug used in the medical institution, surgical equipment, and medical assistant electronics; and cosmetic equipment. It also provides medical administration services for single department. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 880, Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235

1.Name: Mr. Cheng-Hsiao  Chou
1.Title: CFO, Accounting Chief & Corp. Governance Officer
